General.Name: Apeloa Pharmaceutical Co Ltd
General.Description: Apeloa Pharmaceutical Co.,Ltd provides raw materials and intermediates to various pharmaceutical factories in China and internationally. The company offers preparation products, including cardio-cerebrovascular, anti-infection, anti-tumor, anti-viral, and special drugs. It offers its products under the Tianliwei, Beshin, Yosemade, Jutai, and other brands. The company was founded in 1989 and is based in Dongyang, China.
